website_summaries.verdict: These impressive hand grips are lauded for their impeccable sizing and gentle texture.
pros: Buyers were impressed by the immediate comfort they felt in these gloves
Extremely smooth texture when compared to similar models
cons: Finger holes themselves can be a little uncomfortable upon first use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well, shoe's aren't the only thing my daughter outgrew over the summer. I bought these in a Medium and she's 9 and these fit her perfect. The wrist wrap is very comfortable to her and there's plenty of length to wear wrist bands under these and still have ample room to close and have a secure fit. The palms are soft and easy to break in and she was able to use them the day she got them. You can adjust the finger holes a bit if you need to do so - just cut around the hole that's already in the grip to make it larger or rounder as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Madison T. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is a level 3/4 gymnast and she said ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 3/4 gymnast and she said these hurt more than not using grips. She said another girl on her team has the same grips and had the same problem with them. Apparently they are really rough and hurt in between their fingers where the holes for their fingers are. I wanted these to work because I really don't want to spend $40 on grips.
customer_reviews.author: JJsMommy

customer_reviews.title: Good product but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised, but please note that the measuring guide runs small. The pair that we received does not fit the hand size as indicated... recommend you order a size up
customer_reviews.author: foxhenchman

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, work well.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 11 year old perfectly. She only has bars at gymnastics every other week. She'd end up with huge raw blisters every bars class. These have prevented the blisters. Her only complaint was the grips hurt her wrists. We got her $3 sweatbands to put under the wrist straps. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. You're getting what you pay for. Nothing special but exactly what I was looking for. I can say these are perfect for crossfit athletes looking for a better grip doing gymnastics moves-pullups, toes to bar, muscle ups ect. Since the wrist strap is just Velcro I put pre-wrap under the band just so I don't cut up my wrist! Got a size large and like they way they fit, just measure you're hand and the size chart is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: The fit was very small even with the measurement guide. I first got a medium size with the proper measurements for my 9 year old then had to return to get a large. Still too small. My 7 year old has bigger hands than her. They do seem to be well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding grips for CrossFit - I am a small woman with small hands. Everything was too big, expensive, and didn't last. I decided to try out an old favorite as a former youth gymnast. I bought these in a large and have been using them for years - I am just now thinking I'll replace them. Great quality and value. Excellent choice for woman, boys and girls for gymnastics or CrossFit.
customer_reviews.author: Hound Dana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9 year old gymnast who earned her 1st tear. I truly LOVE these particular ones because they are leather and well made. Her coach was also pleased with the design. The leather keeps her grip and strength, while allowing her to continue to work on the bars while her tear heals. I used the measurements, and bought a large for my small daughter and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: marriah michael

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, painful between fingers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size medium, even though I have very small hands (I saw other reviews recommended sizing up) and I still felt like they were too small. The velcro band was barely at my wrist, sort of sitting at the bottom of my palm. But the worst part was the irritation between my fingers. The material is durable but the fit is awful. I tried using them 3x before deciding to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: kylie

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine, I got a medium size for 10 years ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for her gymnastics, she likes it. Fits fine, I got a medium size for 10 years old, her hands are average size.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Entrepreneur

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, not the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased XL for myself to practice trapeze classes in. I’m 5’4 and have decent sized hands. The hot pink color is very vibrant and fun. But the XL was way too larger even though I measured well for that size. Returned. Will try purchasing the next size down
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked with slight modification
customer_reviews.text: The edge of the hook and loop fastener was uncomfortable and rubbed my daughter's wrist raw, so we put sweat bands or athletic tape (whichever we have handy at the time) on before putting these on and it fixed the issue. I purchased size large for my average size 8 year old. Fit like a champ. We are not unhappy but you may want to spend a little more money for something more comfortable if you don't want to layer them.
customer_reviews.author: JuiceFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Good not great quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our daughter because she kept ripping the skin on her hands at gymnastics. They do work well in regards to protecting her hands. They seem a bit stiff and are not the most comfortable grips. If she were going multiple days a week we might look for better grips. However, she is not so they work for what she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danny and Crystal Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not so much, sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter really didn’t like the fit. She likes to play on the monkey bars at school. They didn’t help keep the blisters away.
customer_reviews.author: albert brown

customer_reviews.title: Helped to prevent blistering
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got a gymnastics bar for christmas. She had used it so much that she had many blisters on her hands so I got her these to help. It is taking some time to get use to using them but she really likes them. Her hands are not all blistered up like they were.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Durable and helps to protect hands
customer_reviews.text: My kids use these for our backyard ninja course. My 15 year old loves them and they have really cut down on blisters and help him be able to work out longer. My 12 year old thinks they affect his grip and slip on his hands, but they are a little big on him. They are durable and good quality. Overall, they have really helped protect their hands much more when used, so that is what we were looking for the most!
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with little tweaking
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughter and as many have said the finger tips need to be widen. One other is the velcro around the wrist digs into to her wrist. Simple fix was sweat bands. A little sand paper to widen the holes for the finger and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donald

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Such awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used it the other day and my hand is as smooth as a baby's tush. Actually, I'm still getting used to it. I've never used one of these before and the extra layer between my hand and the bar takes a getting used to. It'll get there.
customer_reviews.author: Rickybobby

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and pliable. Not hard material like dowel grips. Good for anyone doing bar basics. Def get wrist guards/sweat band material because the cuff rubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesnt like them, says they hurt her hand. The velcro strap is also quite scratchy. I have to buy something better now and wish I hadn't wasted the money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Headon-Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for regular workouts
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I have small hands and have a hard time finding anything in my size they did seem to fit but the pink part that wraps around your wrist is very uncomfortable and is basically just cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to have shrunk from its original size after washing
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure this item is suppose to shrink after washing it. Daughter used it several times. It did not give her the support and protection she was hoping but it worked a little bit to prevent caluss
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old daughter is in gymnastics and wanted grips for the bars. She really likes these and they fit perfectly. Just make sure you measure the child's hand and order accordingly from the size chart. Plus, they're pink! Very satisfied with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Koenig

customer_reviews.title: after measuring like they say to
customer_reviews.text: they run bigger then expected,after measuring like they say to,,when you get them ,they are bigger then expected,but a nice product,fast shipping, update,after re measuring and ordering a smaller size, they are great for what they are needed for nice product,fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality. Packaging is damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece. It's not best of quality at first glance but seems okay we will know more about the durability once she start using it. The packaging is damaged when it arrived but the product is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! She says... It makes it easier to go on my bar and when your hands get sweaty you put them on and you wont slip of the bar. They are comfy and they don't hurt your wrists or you hands. They make it easier to go on your bar at home at school or at the gym. They also help you to not get blisters. I like that they are velcro so you can make sure they are not to tight. My hands don't hurt when i am done on my bar and my wrists don't have any marks on them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Everett

customer_reviews.title: Fab for great price
customer_reviews.text: 38 yr old former gymnast. Broke out my bars refinished and bought these and a chalk block. Love it. Closest thing to flying. They fit well and are comfortable!!!!!!! Great price.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLovd

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: Bought medium for my 4 year old and my 7 year old. Fits both of them fine. We are using for metal bars so makes swinging a bit difficult without chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got these grips for my 7 year old as her first pair....she has only worn them once, but we are happy with them so far! She loves the pink, and feels like such a big girl with them on ;) Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: They'll probably wear out faster than other grips I've used but I don't mind that much since they are so comfortable. I use thes
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather, which means they break in really quickly. They'll probably wear out faster than other grips I've used but I don't mind that much since they are so comfortable. I use these for flying trapeze 1-2x/week so I don't expect for them to wear out as quickly as if someone was using these daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gough

customer_reviews.title: My niece liked them but a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my niece. She really liked them but she did say they got a little uncomfortable after a while. Quality seems to ve good since she has used them for over three months.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Size up. I am a normal sized woman and I totally could have used a large. Other than that, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Michael

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first but I love these! They fit so well and didn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but I love these! They fit so well and didn't take very long to break in. They don't bunch up at the top, but the wrist wrap can dig a little if too tight. They have held up very well through several gymnastics intense metcons
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: ... I got these grips for her and they are amazing! They definitely help if you start to get ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a gymnast and so I got these grips for her and they are amazing! They definitely help if you start to get blisters and rips.
customer_reviews.author: KARA

customer_reviews.title: Great product for little gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: I believe we received two of the same hand, as her gym coach told her. But still a great product, those bars are rough on the little ones hands. My 10 year old loves having these.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Louanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is level one and this were perfect for practice. Inexpensive and great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Good hand grips for the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Fit was good and so far they are holding up. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Maybe adult xs or xxs small,  adult hands got medium and are great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Hands are to small for adult grips. I use these for CrossFit and they have been awesome. Most kiddos outgrow me at 10yo so I read reviews and got the medium they are perfect. As for durability can’t say yet but definitely get some wristbands to wear under Velcro strap, much more comfortable that way!
customer_reviews.author: Kim bodle

customer_reviews.title: I ordered based on the measurements provided to determine size ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered based on the measurements provided to determine size, they seem ok but I'm wondering if I should have bought the next size larger. Other than that, they are just what I expected! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: nikkibo77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect and she loves working the bars in her gymnastics class.
customer_reviews.author: MVHall

customer_reviews.title: As needed!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for my 12 year old gymnast. Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable. Using weekly for 6 months and they last so far
customer_reviews.author: Derwishj

customer_reviews.title: small but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: these are pretty small i got a size medium and they look like can can fit a six year old but over all they are great they are pretty tight on the fingers but we don't have chalk at the moment so overall they are a good product and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Use for trapeze
customer_reviews.text: Use these for trapeze. Love the color, very bright. They mostly broke in from the first class, the leather is a nice thickness for me. I'll probably go through a few pairs, the trapeze is hard on them. For the price, you'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium for my 10 yr old daughter, should have purchased a large. They still don't prevent callouses or blisters on the hands. I purchased the product in hopes that it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Stretch stinks but great beginners
customer_reviews.text: Love these grips as an adult! Doing basic bars skills like pullovers and tap swings and they hold up. Only complaint is they stretch a bit more than I personally anticipated and the holes are a touch big now. Other than that great grips!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality grips!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality grips for working on a kip! Also purchased sports wrist bands to wear underneath and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Didnt realize the wrist bands didnt come with.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t care for them as they are very stiff and the pieces between her fingers hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is just starting out and these work wonderfully for her.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these palm grips. She loves gymnastics and these are just what she needed for the bars.
customer_reviews.author: fhmac

customer_reviews.title: Great for Flying Trapeze
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for flying trapeze using a gauze bar. They are a great option if you fly without dowels. They are good quality, especially for the price. My hands are protected and they grip the bar well. They tend to stretch and bunch up when in tricks involving a grip change, but for the price they will be easy to replace when worn through.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hamill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: If your a little kid and just starting gymnastics then these are pretty good but once you are older or move up levels I would recommend baille grips they are sturdier for harder tricks but again if your new these are great!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great as Advertise.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time, no complain, all same as advertise. Good PRoduct, i dont have any complain until now.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: sizing off
customer_reviews.text: Product material feels ok, but sizing was not right. i measured as instructed but they are too small. barely can wrap wrost strap once it is on my fingers, not long enough
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M

customer_reviews.title: Meant for child’s hand
customer_reviews.text: More for a child’s hand so I had to give away
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ok just not for me
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine. I tried out the two hole grips but they just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: daughter did nt really like these uncomfortable she said but good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Roach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. We bought these a few years ago and my daughter is still using them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: 1. Fits good. 2. Grips good. 3. Looks good. 4. Feels good.
customer_reviews.author: C G

customer_reviews.title: Fits way too small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and did not hold up well. Terrible quality and the sizing is way too small. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Awes

customer_reviews.title: They aren't the most comfortable things in the world but they do a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to swing around on her jungle gym equipment. They aren't the most comfortable things in the world but they do a great job of preventing blisters and improving her grip on the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Gusty

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run very small. I am returning my XL grips as they were too short, even though I measured properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: SIZE ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing these Hand Grips there is not a SIZE block. I'm 5" 7' at 165 LBS and these wouldn't even fit my youngest daughter. Wore them once and now I'm donating them to ANYBODY with Child size hands.
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like them for Crossfit and my daughter did not like them for gymnastics, they are thick and bunch up bad.
customer_reviews.author: m. valerio

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for my daughter just learning to use grips
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn’t like them and says they are uncomfortable. She’s in gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were too small for my daughter so I recommend ordering a size up. That is the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: huff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter did not like these at all. didn't fit well and not good quality
customer_reviews.author: AwallsRN

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size
customer_reviews.text: Go down a size from the manufacturer's recommendation. They stretch out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: A must have for gymnastics!
customer_reviews.text: My niece does gymnastics and her hands were getting blisters, these are a must have to protect your hands!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: My palm is a little over 3 1/2 inches and large size didn’t fit me. Would recommend to buy the XL.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN GALVAN

customer_reviews.title: Honestly best purchase I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for Crossfit. Honestly best purchase I’ve made. They’ve kept my calluses from ripping even after 200 pull-ups. I’m probably ordering them again once these get destroyed. Also supper affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Scratch the wrist when wearing, broken my daughter skin because of the velcro. Material started to tear from the pink velcro to the leather
customer_reviews.author: keri freitas

customer_reviews.title: These are great.. I use them a few times a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great .. I use them a few times a week ..tight at first but the leather loosens up and they are super comfortable to life weights or do crossfit with .. I'm 37 5'4" 140 with small hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to use it for my workouts. I used the measurement guide and ordered a medium. (Should Have has room to spare) the wrist band fits at the bottom of my palm therefore I am unable to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, durable, fast shipping. Definitely buy the wrist bands to go underneath.
customer_reviews.author: mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them at first but they wear out too fast.
customer_reviews.author: KooserFugate

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This product is very uncomfortable and the size chart is actually incorrect technically speaking. The grips that were supposed to fit my hand according to the sizing chart were actually way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Markos

customer_reviews.title: They don't like them.
customer_reviews.text: My girls can't spin around on the bars when they have these on. They fit right but seem to bunch up. They don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not competition grade
customer_reviews.text: Velcro cuts. Must wear thick wrist guards. For play time, not practice time.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: These worked well, but we're a little small. I will be ordering up a size. These are for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: Fits my daughter perfectly. She is 7 and needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfectly. She is 7 and needed some beginner grips to help protect her hands on the bars in gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They’re stretching too much in a short period of time on the side by the finger placements.
customer_reviews.author: Scott/Sara Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Ordered black, received pink. XL is closer to a medium size.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Super small, wrong color, crap material. Complete waste of $10. I tried them on and got stuck so now they aren’t returnable.
customer_reviews.author: jasondavis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: A bit large for my five year old, but some clever cutting of the leather made it fit fine. She's preteam and this worked for home use. I would say if you are wanting something super durable and long lasting you'd be better off with a different product. For the price, I got what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects thisefrom calluses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little gymnast! Protects her hands from those awful calluses.
customer_reviews.author: C Taf

customer_reviews.title: Gymnast Dream
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who was complaining about the bars causing sores and callouses on his hands. Perfect! Now all the other students want a pair. Told them to go on Amazon because they are hard to find in stores. Shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: 11 kids and counting

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Works great. My daughter uses wristband under though to make it more confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter loves these. I got a medium and they fit great for her small hands. I thought she would need a small but medium fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed for gymnastics. She is very petite for her age. I purchased a medium for her and it fit perfectly. Also, very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jazb21

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I had grips of XL size from another brand and were too small, these XL actually fit and are not overexaggerated in advertisements. They live up to their size
customer_reviews.author: badavidson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter, the size chart is helpful. They are flexible & durable
customer_reviews.author: Amy Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Perfect size for my petite 9 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but..
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price! The only problem is if you wet them the grips start chipping off kind of like erasers when you use them, but for the price I definitely recommended and they're great for beginner gymnasts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six year old
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter perfectly! She loves them! She is 6 years old and I ordered her the medium. When I measured I thought it may still be a little big but they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Mooney

customer_reviews.title: but she does not like them. They are not comfortable for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 9 year old daughter, but she does not like them. They are not comfortable for her.
customer_reviews.author: IO

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!! Will make business again
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!!!!i recommend for those currently doing CrossFit!!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Alanis

customer_reviews.title: We could never use them
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The leather is not soft. My daughter could not use them
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: Great grips for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my daughter, the sizing chart is accurate. These are sturdy and kept my daughter, who is prone to ripping, free from injury!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

product_meta.title: Gibson Rainbow Gymnastics Hand Grips, MADE IN USA
product_meta.description: Soft leather grips with velcro closure. Available in red, white, black, blue, pink and purple. Sold as a pair!
feature_bullets: Made for strength training and gymnastics. Minimize rips, tears, blisters and calluses on your hands
Palm grip. Fingers holes to be worn at base of fingers.
To size, measure from base of middle finger to base of palm. Medium - 3 to 3.5", Large - 3.5 to 4", X-Large - 4" and up
Slightly undersized finger holes for customized fit. Recommended that you use sandpaper to increase hole size
Made in the USA, with top quality US tanned leather with all imperfections removed. 30-day manufacturer's warranty
